com.nukethemoon.tools.ani

Class Ani

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nukethemoon.tools.ani.Ani

  • public class Ani
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller to add and update animations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ani()
      Creates a new animation controller.
      Ani(int pInterval)
      Creates a new animation controller.

      Adds a sequence of animations that will be added one after another.

      Gets the global time factor used for all animations.

      Returns true if this instance is enabled.

      Stops all animations and call animation.inFinish and the listeners.

      Cancels all animations without calling animation.onFinish or its listeners.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ani

        public Ani()
        Creates a new animation controller. Use this if you want to update animations on your own (e.g. every render frame)

      • Ani

        public Ani(int pInterval)
        Creates a new animation controller. Updates it self every pInterval milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        pInterval - The update interval in milliseconds.

    • Method Detail

      BaseAnimation pAnimation)
        Adds an animation with a start delay.
        Parameters:
        pStartDelayMillis - A delay to start the animation in milliseconds.
        pAnimation - The animation to add.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • add

        public final Ani add(BaseAnimation[] pAnimations,
      AnimationFinishedListener pAllAnimationFinishedListener)
        Adds multiple animations and a listener to fall if all are finished.
        Parameters:
        pAnimations - The animations.
        pAllAnimationFinishedListener - The listener to call is all animations are finished.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • addSequence

        public final Ani addSequence(BaseAnimation[] pAnimations,
              AnimationFinishedListener pSequenceFinishedListener)
        Adds a sequence of animations that will be added one after another.
        Parameters:
        pAnimations - The animation sequence to add.
        pSequenceFinishedListener - A listener that gets called if the sequence has ended.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • addSequence

        public final Ani addSequence(BaseAnimation[] pAnimations)
        Adds a sequence of animations that will be added one after another.
        Parameters:
        pAnimations - The animation sequence to add.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • update

        public final boolean update()
        Calls the animation update method or removes the animation if it is done. It also calls the "AnimationFinishListener" of the animation if it is done.
        Returns:
        False if no animation has been handled.

      • getAnimationCount

        public int getAnimationCount()
        Gets the count of all animations.
        Returns:
        The count.

      • cancel

        public boolean cancel(BaseAnimation pAnimation)
        Stops the animation the hard way. Does not call animation.onFinish nor its finish listeners.
        Parameters:
        pAnimation - The animation to cancel.
        Returns:
        True if the animation was found.

      • stop

        public Ani stop(BaseAnimation pAnimation)
        Gracefully stops the animation and calls its listeners.
        Parameters:
        pAnimation - The animation to stop.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • resetHard

        public Ani resetHard()
        Cancels all animations without calling animation.onFinish or its listeners.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • resetGraceful

        public Ani resetGraceful()
        Stops all animations and call animation.inFinish and the listeners. Disables this instance while stopping. Enables it afterwards.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • setAllAnimationFinishedListener

        public Ani setAllAnimationFinishedListener(AnimationFinishedListener pListener)
        Sets a listener that will be called if all animations of this controller are finished.
        Parameters:
        pListener - The listener to call.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • setGlobalAnimationTimeFactor

        public static void setGlobalAnimationTimeFactor(float pTimeFactor)
        Stets a global factor to the animation speed. Value 1.0 is the standard value. The assigned value must be higher than 0.0.
        Parameters:
        pTimeFactor - The time factor to set for all animations.

      • getGlobalTimeFactor

        public static float getGlobalTimeFactor()
        Gets the global time factor used for all animations.
        Returns:
        The global time factor.

      • setEnabled

        public Ani setEnabled(boolean pEnabled)
        Enables and disables the controller.
        Parameters:
        pEnabled - The state.
        Returns:
        This instance.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if this instance is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if this instance is enabled.
